# Chief of Staff Recruitment Agency Quest

> Chief of Staff Recruitment Agency Quest aggregates CoS job opportunities from top UK companies, helping professionals discover Chief of Staff roles in tech, startups, consulting, and enterprise.

## What We Do

Chief of Staff Quest is a specialist recruitment agency focused exclusively on Chief of Staff positions. We aggregate job listings from LinkedIn, company career pages, Greenhouse, and other sources to provide the most comprehensive view of the Chief of Staff job market.

## Target Audience

- Professionals seeking Chief of Staff roles
- Companies looking to hire a Chief of Staff
- Consultants transitioning to in-house CoS positions
- Operations professionals moving into strategic roles

## Key Services

1. **Job Aggregation**: We collect Chief of Staff job listings from multiple sources
2. **Free Job Board**: Employers can post CoS roles for free
3. **Career Resources**: Guides on breaking into and excelling as a Chief of Staff

## Geographic Focus

- Primary: United Kingdom (London-based)
- Secondary: United States, Europe, Global Remote

## Contact

- Website: https://chiefofstaff.quest
- Email: hello@chiefofstaff.quest
- Location: London, UK

## Important Pages

- Homepage: https://chiefofstaff.quest
- Job Board: https://chiefofstaff.quest/jobs
- Contact: https://chiefofstaff.quest/contact

## About Chief of Staff Roles

The Chief of Staff role is a strategic position supporting C-level executives. Responsibilities typically include:

- Managing cross-functional initiatives
- Driving special projects
- Facilitating executive communication
- Preparing board materials
- Ensuring organisational priorities are executed

Average UK salary: £70,000 - £150,000+ depending on company size and seniority.
